website_summaries.verdict: We like the dry powder formulation of this bleach alternative – much easier than liquid bleach. Bottle holds a generous 128 load supply.
pros: Gentle bleaching on clothing, not a harsh chemical action
Can be used as a multi-purpose cleaning solution
cons: Dry product stored in a package for liquids
Challenging to use in HE washing machines

customer_reviews.title: Will save you money.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a septic system. The system was backing up so I wanted to cut back on harsh, anti-microbial chemicals like chlorine bleach. Bought bedding from Brooklinen and they recommended using this product with their products. Decided to give it a try. I’ve come back for more. From cleaning the floors to doing laundry, small amounts of this product do extraordinary things. No noxious odors, discolored clothes/fabrics, etc. A tiny amount has saved me a ton on white undershirts. Undershirts that are 5+ years old and ready for dish cloth status came out white as white can be. Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.author: RedLetterYear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Brightening Product
customer_reviews.text: I know this seems like something you might think why would I buy this product when I can go to the market and buy XYZ. Let me tell you why. First, it doesn't bleach your sheets if it gets stuck in a crack! It works so well brightening your fabrics that I've been buying it regularly. Also their detergent. I bought expensive sheets and I didn't want to use regular products on them. Also, it is scented but it doesn't bother me, and I have issues with fragrances. I really recommend this if you have clothes or sheets you cherish!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra T

customer_reviews.title: No better than usual stain removal products - worse maybe
customer_reviews.text: After following the instructions to the letter, and trying twice to removed one butter stain and one salad dressing stain, so both oily. I had no luck at all. They came back immediately, never disappeared. Despite the rave reviews, I found this to be an utter waste of $$. I'll stick with the traditional products which cost less and work better. I appreciate the credit I was given on the product.
customer_reviews.author: R Vancleve

customer_reviews.title: Needs Work
customer_reviews.text: The Laundress makes some nice laundry products in containers that are easy to dispense. Unfortunately, this is not one of them. These beads of oxygen bleach are packaged in the same flip-top liquid dispensing bottles as their liquid detergents, which seems silly. One must unscrew the top of the bottle to add the contents to the load. One other issue - the granules are so dense that they sometimes fail to leave the detergent dispenser of my LG front loading washer. Clearly, this product needs work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brian Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, not quite as powerful as bleach
customer_reviews.text: We started using this product because we have three kids under 2 and just trying to avoid having to use real bleach for their safety (debatable if it matters still). Out of the different alternatives we've tried, this seems to be one of the better ones, but is also easy to use. I wish there was a better way to measure the proper amount for laundry other than trying to fill two cap fulls, we ended up just sacrificing one of our cheap measuring cups and marking it to make it simpler.
customer_reviews.author: sven

customer_reviews.title: provides a bleach alternative for undergarments.
customer_reviews.text: works quite well on older yellowing bras, not white and bright again but reduced yellow appearance in spandex.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna2002

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Good
customer_reviews.text: My family know me as the "laundry nazi" hahaha But I love for my whites to be white and I can get out almost any stain. The Laundress All-Purpose Bleach Alternative is absolutely amazing!!! It brightened my dingy whites to looking nearly new again and brightened my colors. Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my favorite shirt!
customer_reviews.text: I love laundress products. I even removed stains from clothes my dry-cleaner gave up. I am talking about 3-4 years old coffee stain! It was my favorite shirt I got from Anthropologie. I wore to places I wanted to impress clients. One day, I spilled a cup of coffee on my shirts. I was so sad. I tried to remove by washing it right away. Still left marks. My drycleaner lady told me it was a goner 3-4 years ago. Hah! It is removed. This product saved my favorite shirt! I wash my own clothes these days.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: seems as average
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it more than 10 times and seems as very average. It does work only for mild cases for me. It didn't really clean sweat from white shirts/fresh juices/rust from the white jeans. I do like it is a nontoxic and fragrance-free compare to chlorine bleach but i was expecting a bit better results.
customer_reviews.author: Kirill

customer_reviews.title: Adding to laundry didn’t do much
customer_reviews.text: Branding got me, but it didn’t get the whites any brighter in my laundry. Tried 2x with no real noticeable difference in brightening. I only tried as a laundry additive, perhaps the other methods like soaking will yield better results?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient to use. Would try pods.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like The Laundress products but the packaging and liquid form of their products is inconvenient. Would consider trying pods if they came out with them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the alternative to chemical bleach to get my whites and colors bright. We have well water and clothes get dingy. Using this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Whites Shine like the Chrysler Building ✨
customer_reviews.text: This works! Even when you accidentally (on purpose sometimes) throw something pink or gray in with your whites for a quick upstairs wash in the Bosch. Everything comes out newer looking. I’ve been using for one year & am back repeatedly for more.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not for Spot Treating
customer_reviews.text: I tried mixing this with boiling water to create a paste and dissolve the spheres, yet even boiling water didn’t dissolve the spheres fully. I think it would be better in a powder formulation like another popular product.
customer_reviews.author: BAE

customer_reviews.title: Laundry Essential
customer_reviews.text: One of the best laundry products. Definitely keeps whites whiter, and I also use it with lighter colors to brighten things up. I also use it as part of what I put into an overnight soak for stained white items. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: NYCBuyer

customer_reviews.title: the best I've ever spent my money on
customer_reviews.text: the best I've ever spent my money on. I use it for almost everything, rugs, colors, whites, etc. it's super safe and super concentrated, so a little goes a long way. TiP: a little bit of this + stain removal = paste that takes away armpits yellow and just about any stain. (not safe for silk, or cashmere)
customer_reviews.author: Naddy2.0

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Works- but is simply oxi-clean with added washing soda. You can make your own for MUCH less.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great Alt Bleach. Concentrated, no fillers
customer_reviews.text: This might seem expensive but I use so much less because it has no fillers like OxyClean. It ends up being more cost effective
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie ETop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Great chlorine alternative, and easier on our septic system
customer_reviews.text: We are on a septic system so I needed a non-chlorine bleach, for our whites as we are also on well water which can sometimes cause whites to look dingy. I used this along with another oxy clean product and they do make a difference, also they can be used on color clothing to help remove stains
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear

customer_reviews.title: Brightens white and colors !
customer_reviews.text: Like the convenience, I just use a cap full per load. Laundress products have always been safe for all my clothes! The clean smell without any perfume smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These products are worth every penny, best I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Very fine line of products to gently take care of you towels, bedding, all clothing, linens and delicates.
customer_reviews.author: mWd

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The contents of this product are nothing more than sodium per carbonate--quite overpriced given there are other products that do the job of bleaching without chlorine, perhaps more effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great at multitasking!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and even use a capful once in awhile in my dishwasher to keep it sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: CATE

customer_reviews.title: Great, just need patience for dissolving.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it’s a natural ingredient with no additives and does a good job cleaning. The sucky part is getting the crystals to dissolve without adding too much water.
customer_reviews.author: jamal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: The Laundress never disappoints! Great value, excellent quality and a cap full goes a long way. This product should be in every kitchen, laundry room and bathroom. It's one of my must have products!
customer_reviews.author: Hildy A. Straightiff

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well. I do wish there was a better measuring system rather than pouring into the cap. It lasts a fair amount of time for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: My new fav.
customer_reviews.text: I pre soaked my white sweater for a day in the solution and it took the stains out. It didn't change the feel of the fabric either.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: These balls fly everywhere and are hard to actually apply to stains for spot cleaning. I’m a fan of all their products except for this. Other product work well
customer_reviews.author: ATLien

customer_reviews.title: Useful but with small problem
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this laundry detergent, which is of great quality. However, the cap is not so well that there is always leakage associated there.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product - not just the Bleach Alternative but the softener as well as the detergent.  AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually really leery of buying bleach alternative and even detergent to wash clothes. They usually don't work very well. I've so impressed with this product. The Laundress products are just amazing and they smell sooooo good!
customer_reviews.author: crbrlrsn

customer_reviews.title: Stain gone!
customer_reviews.text: I got a peach juice stain on pajamas that I love. First I bought The Laundress Stain Remover. It lightened the stain but didn’t remove it. I bought this product after more research. I combined it with the stain remover and made a paste on the fabric. I soaked in hot water for 30 minutes then laundered as directed. It came out completely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed non-chlorine bleach and no one had it
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find this product. It was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: leh

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's an alternative to bleach
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested the bleach on anything white yet, but on colors it's pretty good. I like that it doesn't have any smell at all, and that two capfuls can handle a full wash-load.
customer_reviews.author: minseven

customer_reviews.title: Smell of this product is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this product is amazing! It does a great job and you don't need much that helps with the price.
customer_reviews.author: kmb

customer_reviews.title: And now you tell me I can’t return it and get a refund.
customer_reviews.text: I have not opened the bottle. I waited and waited to get it. in the meantime I got bleach from someone else. Also I didn’t realize how expensive it is I think it’s way too much money And now you tell me I can’t return it and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Get’s Your Clothes Clean
customer_reviews.text: I love all products from this Company Laundress the All Purpose Bleach added to your wash for whites or colors gets them clean stains out with a little vinegar.
customer_reviews.author: Minigirl

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love love love has to be the best laundry product ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A worthy splurge
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully packaged, imscent-free, good for the earth. It is an outstanding component to clean with beyond laundry—took off and whitened a sink that had caked on yuck. Look online for videos, it is a super versatile product.
customer_reviews.author: ACJ10

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Better than oxy clean and safer to use for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mlostek

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can use this with both lights and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can use this with both lights and darks without worrying about bleach spots. It seems to make my whites brighter and I like that it's pellets instead of messy liquid.
customer_reviews.author: MI Book Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. If stains didn't come out right away then make a paste with Laundress Stain remover and let sit overnight. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Colorsafe
customer_reviews.text: Absolute best laundry cleanser for white and colored clothes stains. Great alone to whiten whites.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I like this bleach alternative- but maybe there is a placebo effect in place for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bleach alternative. You need to understand however that can't go in the dispenser. Plus it probably washes away at the beginning of the cycle versus later.
customer_reviews.author: MMB IN NJ

customer_reviews.title: Used product was sent to me
customer_reviews.text: the seal of product was opened and there are little pieces and hair in the bottle...
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: we love all The Laundress products
customer_reviews.text: Our new go-to bleach alternative! we love all The Laundress products!
customer_reviews.author: Proficio

customer_reviews.title: Upset 😢
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. Spilled out all throughout box and leaked onto my floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Got this based on other product reviews, and I have to say, it really works! Have been really pleased with all of my Laundress products so far.
customer_reviews.author: ATseng

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my white clothes so white and is color sage!
customer_reviews.author: BrazucaMama

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to products with harsher chemicals
customer_reviews.text: The Laundress is a great brand and this is yet another product that doesn't disappoint. I add to every laundry load
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Crisp Whites Forever"
customer_reviews.text: I cannot live without this amazing product. I love it so much; that when I send my son off packing to college it was on his "must have' list of items! THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: maria elena noble

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other bleach substitutes
customer_reviews.text: I find that I use a lot less of this product than I used to use of Oxy, to get better results, so it is worth its price. It smells great, and removes the toughest stains. I follow the directions and add it to the washer before adding clothes, and it dissolves with no problem, in any temperature water.
customer_reviews.author: cynqua

customer_reviews.title: Cleanest Floor Ever
customer_reviews.text: I added this to the all purpose cleaner to wash my old kitchen floor. It’s the cleanest my floor has ever been.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this Bleach Alternative! Smells fresh and gets our clothes just as white as bleach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to clean a pet stain on white carpet! Not sure about set in stains though.
customer_reviews.author: coyo

customer_reviews.title: Great for laundry
customer_reviews.text: I like this for adding to laundry. Haven't used it for cleaning yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Mauldin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and to my surprise it was double the size of one I had at home. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Y. Winn

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: There's no scent but so far this has been a great alternative to the bleach I was using. I use it on every load pretty much and I'm so far happy. It makes me whites bright and no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong cleaner, great smell
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning all around the house. I've used it mostly for mopping and it has a wonderful smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Laracuente

customer_reviews.title: does nothing to stains. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to spend $15 dollars on some "bleach alternative." It did absolutely nothing to my white jeans or white shorts. I did a pre-soak with the product and added product to washing machine; they look the exact same as if i had just rinsed with water. This product is pretty worthless on clothing, and I am very disappointed that I just spend $15 dollars on something I will never use again. I do not recommend it. I cannot even return the item because of some "special packaging problem." Don't waste your money here.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Super powered!
customer_reviews.text: When combined with their stain solution it for out stains no other could while not ruining the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Molly C

customer_reviews.title: Takes the stains out
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go to laundry detergents for whites. Better than Oxyclean!
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the smell and this product gets my clothes brighter
customer_reviews.author: BShea

customer_reviews.title: Need to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: This item arrive broken the bleach was all over the box,this needs to be replaced , Thank you
customer_reviews.author: DARLENE S. WEEKS

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with The Laundress Stain Remover on a white shirt with yellow underarm stains. The stains were old but they came out and the shirt looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Waterbenny

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not as superior as Clorox
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is alternative bleach, and given it's from The Laundress, I feel safe that I'm using a good product. However, it doesn't remove egg dye as well as normal Clorox, but eventually after letting it sit for two days, my pot was completely clear. (Greeks use red egg dye for their eggs every Easter, and the brand of dye I used this year was fickle to say the least.)
customer_reviews.author: Eleni K

customer_reviews.title: Smells great in classic scent though
customer_reviews.text: The classic scent smells fresh when I take out my laundry - but unfortunately the unscented has been shipped to me more than a few times by mistake. I stopped ordering it and just throw in a "tide pod" with my "charlie's soap powder". The laundress bleach alternative MUST be dissolved in warm/hot water in your washer BEFORE adding laundry, otherwise you'll end up with white gritty sand all over your clothes when you get ready to put in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Love all of these products I bought a very good ...
customer_reviews.text: Love all of these products I bought a very good washing machine and rarely go to a dry cleaner. Wash all of my cashmere, this is a great product for whites and. Bedding as well Love the products, worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rayray21

customer_reviews.title: ... product with the expectation that it would remove a dirty ring around the bathroom shower stall drain
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product with the expectation that it would remove a dirty ring around the bathroom shower stall drain. Unfortunately, it did nothing to clean it after 2 attempts. No other cleaning product that I tried was effective either.
customer_reviews.author: Florida non-techie

customer_reviews.title: Great bleach alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using The Laundress products for a few years now and love them! I decided to try out this bleach alternative for our whites, which were starting to look a bit gray. After a month of use and a few loads of laundry a week, I'm happy with the results. Bleach is really bad for your clothes, although it does whiten them up quickly. This doesn't work as quickly as one load with bleach, but after a few washes I can see a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: amymn

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in cold water
customer_reviews.text: So I've used other Laundress items and added this to my subscribe and save. I didn't look through the full description because I have loved the other 3 detergents I've bought (classic, whites and sport). I was hoping to like this but I honestly have no items I wash in hot water... and this just doesn't dissolve in my HE washer on the cold settings. So I might try some of the other cleaning suggestions, or try dissolving it in some hot water then adding it to the wash. I would like to see them make a liquid version of this for cold water use.
customer_reviews.author: A Hayes

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN UPON ARRIVAL. NO RETURNS !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed i spent $15 on a broken product as per image. I wouldn’t mind just exchanging for a brand new one that isn’t broken but apparently we cannot return this product. For that reason, I wouldn’t recommend you purchase the item because as seen through other reviews, this product is easily broken and once that happens you can’t get a return. In regards to the actual product, i didn’t notice a difference with my whites. So i don’t have much to say on that.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or time it never dissolves and sticks to everything even tried to use hot water and you can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Gets the stink out!
customer_reviews.text: I put 1 capufull in the washer with workout clothes, towels, and stale sheets. Gets the stink out every time! With stinky kitchen rags, put 1 capfull in a bowl of hot water; soak for 30 min, then wash as normal. Gets the stink out!
customer_reviews.author: jmb

customer_reviews.title: I didn't notice a difference with this at all
customer_reviews.text: During our switch to natural laundry detergents I noticed that our whites were getting a little dingy. I tried adding this to our white loads and noticed no difference in the brightness of our whites. I won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Love The Laundress
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I read about it on YouTube from a gentleman's etiquette podcast. Best thing ever. Follow instructions and your clothes will come out great and also reduce the yellow stains without destroying the fabric. Delivery was on time and well packaged. The bottle is big and you can save money by ordering one at a time and it should last two-three months, depending on loads.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austen queen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bleach alternative!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly sensitive to chemicals, and was looking for a bleach alternative to use in my laundry. I am so glad I gave this one a try! I just add a capful or two (whites) to my laundry detergent and my clothes have stayed bright and clean! There is no scent, which is wonderful. This bottle will last quite a while, but I will definitely be reordering when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wool suits
customer_reviews.text: I wash my fancy wools suits with this shampoo. I had use it locally for a little spot, or for a complete wash as well- I almost do not need a dry clean since I have this shampoo! I washed my suits by hand, with cold water, in my bathroom sink. I try to do not rub them so much. after washing just let them get dry on a hanger, ron them with a Garment Steamer and that's it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Moises H.

customer_reviews.title: Really effective colorsafe whitener
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how well this whitens my whites within a color wash. Had been using some other very competitive brands but was visibly surprised at the brightness of my white bathmat thrown in with a bunch of rags. I have no issue with the packaging, the beads are much easier to maneuver than powder.
customer_reviews.author: shanghaishaman

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works good for a bleach alternative and stain treatment. Also has other uses for cleaning other than clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have ten or twelve white undershirts and dress shirts. This product has worked hard to keep them clean and presentable. This cleaning agent, especially for those of us that are otherwise laundry science deficient, is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Agadga

customer_reviews.title: These products are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the laundress products! The website has wonderful support for different uses and stain fighting. I love the clean smell, crisp packaging and the effectiveness of the product - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W.

customer_reviews.title: A bust
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, not very effective, inconvenient to use in an HE machine, and messy. Also, not rated well for health or environment ingredients/manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Works well but needs different packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this product but thought I'd try it since I love most everything else in The Laundress's lineup. The bottom line: the packaging [flip top] is a pain in the neck. A different delivery system would be appreciated. However, the product works really well and is among the other Laundress products that I've become addicted to...good thing a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The Laundress Alternative Non Chlorine Bleach works great!!
customer_reviews.text: The Laundress All Purpose Alternative Non Chlorine Bleach was a lifesaver for me. It saved a white duvet made of organic cotton. When I originally took the duvet cover out of the washing machine it had black streaks and the Laundress Alternative Non Chlorine Bleach took care of all the black streaks! To my delight it also brightened colors and white laundry. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product because Dan on FOX news Philadelphia recommended it. The bottle was larger than I thought and it was crystal and not liquid. I followed directions and it made my year old white tee shirt bright white again. No more dingy white tees.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Jampo

customer_reviews.title: Works well on whites.
customer_reviews.text: Works well on whites, however may have to adjust quantity usage per load depending on wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Looks fancy, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t tell that it made any difference in the brightness of my whites and did nothing to remove stains, despite using the pretreating method. Waste of money in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ottley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bleach alternative. Love all of there products. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than bleach
customer_reviews.text: I first read about this product a few years ago in Cosmopolitan magazine. The suggestion was to use this to get sweat stains out of white shirts in the summer. Now I use it every time I wash whites. It gets everything really clean!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: No Need For Bleach
customer_reviews.text: This product takes away the need to use bleach in the laundry. Works well with no damage to clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jmazz

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST -- beware of the grains
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting. The little grains in this product get EVERYWHERE -- inside the drum, transfer to the dryer, adhere themselves to garments, but they also just scatter all over the floor. They don't dissolve completely! I tried this several times, hoping that I'd just used it wrong given the good reviews. But then, not only did those little grains stay inside the washer drum, they attached to one another and a big inch-long wad of the grains got stuck to a piece of clothing that got baked in from the dryer. It was horrible and ruined the garment. I usually like The Laundress products, but geez this was absolutely the worst.
customer_reviews.author: G in LA

customer_reviews.title: Buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing - worked wonders on the whites and old stains.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M.

customer_reviews.title: damaged sent to me
customer_reviews.text: No cap and a lot was gone. What the f.
customer_reviews.author: skibunny

customer_reviews.title: Makes whites more white!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to really make whites brighter. I love that it doesn't smell and it septic safe!
customer_reviews.author: John Hummer

customer_reviews.title: Great job of cleansing
customer_reviews.text: It is highly concentrated so will not add as much to mop bucket next time. Does A good job on cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It removes any stain; new or old.

customer_reviews.title: I have loved everything I have purchased from the Laundress line-I probably ...
customer_reviews.text: I have loved everything I have purchased from the Laundress line-I probably have about 5 different products. They all work so well and smell great. A little goes a long way.

product_meta.title: The Laundress - All-Purpose Bleach Alternative, Non-Toxic, Chlorine Free Bleach Alternative, Biodegradable, Fragrance-Free, 33.3 fl oz, 128 washes
product_meta.description: We love to give our laundry and home an extra boost of clean. This nontoxic, biodegradable, and fragrance-free alternative to chlorine bleach works wonders to safely remove dirt, stains, and odors. Add to the wash cycle to whiten and brighten clothes—it’s safe for colors and most fabrics except silk and wool. You can also use this single product to clean your entire home—floors, tiles, sinks, and surfaces. Highly concentrated—up to 32 washes, 64 soaks, and 128 stains. All-Purpose Bleach Alternative is our gentle, color-safe, chlorine-free oxygen bleaching system ideal for whitening and brightening both laundry items and the home. Note that any kind of chlorine alternative or oxygenated bleaching system will not work in cold water, as these products are heat activated. We don’t recommend using chlorine bleach on stains or odors, ever. Not only does chlorine bleach deteriorate, degrade, and weaken fibers, it’s not color-safe. In fact, it can cause whites to yellow and make certain stains (such as rust stains) even worse. Sprinkle All-Purpose Bleach Alternative on items with odors (such as pet accidents or spills). Then launder, steam, or vacuum. This product can also be used as a cleaning solution for the entire home by dissolving in hot water. Safe to combine with all our Laundry & Home Cleaning Products
feature_bullets: CHLORINE BLEACH ALTERNATIVE - This nontoxic, biodegradable, and fragrance-free alternative to chlorine bleach works wonders to safely remove dirt, stains, and odors.
ALLERGEN FREE - Our All-Purpose Bleach Alternative is a nontoxic, biodegradable, and fragrance free alternative to chlorine bleach.
WHITENS AND BRIGHTENS - All-Purpose Bleach Alternative is our gentle, color-safe, chlorine-free oxygen bleaching system ideal for whitening and brightening both laundry items and the home.
ALL-PURPOSE - Our Chlorine Bleach Alternative can also be used as a cleaning solution for the entire home by dissolving in hot water. Safe to combine with all our Laundry & Home Cleaning Products.
CRUELTY-FREE - The Laundress takes pride in the fact that our products contain no animal by-products and are never tested on animals.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
